column5: It happens every year. I know it's early yet for my  favorite shore spot. It's probably two or three weeks away from catching fire. Every year I resolve to wait until October. And then I feel it.  It reminds me of quitting smoking, which I did two weeks ago now. I think "I'm fine, I can do this". And then I feel it.  "I can catch up on stuff around the house". I tell myself.  Today I thought "It's going to be cold tonight, the fish will be off". And that might be true. But still I feel it.  The pull took me up there last weekend and I was rewarded with a chunky largemouth and a 21" walleye. Not bad for being two weeks early. I can't post pics because they'll identify my spot and then you'll feel the pull too. If you don't already.  I always call my buddies and round up the gang. On Monday.  "Are you fishing this weekend?".  "Dude, it's Monday!". Sometimes I wonder if they feel the pull like I do.  It's a rare day when no one comes out so I don't get out alone very often. Perhaps because of that it feels like a rare treat when I do. I didn't call anyone this week. I decided to go alone. I'd have the cold and the coyotes all to myself.  And then my phone rings this morning. "Hey, are you going tonight?".  A smile creeps across my face. Yup, they feel it too.         Thanks for reading my ramblings.  Dutch
Sounds like classic falleye symptoms...
I too feel the pull..Perhaps not the same spot. The pull is much like the force..Every fall it comes on strong..Good luck and have fun!
That's funny, I've never heard it called that before! I definitely have it.   Thanks and you too!
Felt it yesterday morning as I walked into work- drizzle on my face, overcast skies. I took next Wed/Thurs/Fri off and booked the lodge near North Bay- heading back...
I get it too, but its for hunting.  S.
The pull is strong with this one.

I know that feeling too well Dutch!  I consider myself very lucky to have 2 wicked shore spots in my backyard.  Because sometimes that "pull" comes when im very busy, and because of these spots, I can still get out for an hour or two.  Heck sometimes ill go all day, or 4 times a day.  This time of year is amazing!
give it 4 weeks and it will be "on" so to say
I definitely can't wait four weeks! I'll die!  It's my Son's birthday next weekend so I won't be getting out. After that I'm going hardcore until close on Nov 15th.

ive got a week booked off to head to the lake commencing the 28th of October...9 days straight of prime time prime season fishing. Hoping some fall magic happens.  And dutch, who said anything about waiting? Im going up north this weekend for a fish lol.
happened to me on Sunday, caught the musky in my avatar! along with a bunch of smallies.

The pull is strong with this one.   OMG DUDE, is that you? LOL  The pull comes 3 months at a time.  Jan 1st, Pulls me to the ice.Then spring comes and rainbows,whites and lakers. Summer comes and pulled to bass. Fall comes and it salmon and chromers. Then Jan 1st comes around again. Im pulled 12 months of the year.
Im pulled 12 months of the year.   Me too. And I'm still looking for some type of medication to help with that. 12 months of pulling can't be good for you
Lol, my 'pull' is just about done now, as Brook trout season dwindles down.  Time to go hunting...
the PULL is there everyday of the year  and it will be the number 1 thing in my life till I die........
just got the pull engraved on my body...tattoo pictures to be posted upon completion!

I just fished my balls off on a hardcore trip all last week. Even so, while watching the sun set while at work last evening I could feel "the pull" and it was strong.  "The pull" is relentless, especially in autumn, an awesome time of the year.
If you're serious, you win the "most hardcore" award from me!
I feel it all year too but the fall is especially bad.  You gonna meet me at the spot anytime this fall Chris? Send me a PM.....

IMG_2562.JPG  If you're serious, you win the "most hardcore" award from me!  hahaha nah...but started up a fishing tattoo on my body im excited to show it off cause the work is incredible.  2 more sittings to go

You gonna meet me at the spot anytime this fall Chris? Send me a PM.....   yep, I have a contact "Dutch" in my phone, lol, I will text, I wouldn't be surprised if I was "pulled" in that direction this weekend
I'll likely be there Saturday night too. However, I still think it is a week or two early. We'll see if the cooler temps this week turn on the bite.
OMG DUDE, is that you? LOL  I think so.
